Articles.Content: I haven't seen anyone at the gaterunner recently. Is this still alive?
Not many logins lately from the logs, but the server is still around.
Seems 1.2.2 has broke Kerbal Live Feed, I'm troubleshooting it now.

I am not going to be updating this mod anymore, I will leave the server up at least over the next year for anyone that is still using the client or for anyone that wants to pick it up and move it forward.

 

If some does pick it up and wants a place to host I just need the updates to the server whenever you make them and I'll keep the server running.
Thank you for your support over the years, @Stavell. It's much appreciated, and it provided many hours of good fun.
Yes, thank you, stavell. I'm just now getting back into KSP for more than an hour at a time, and am going to be logging in regularly.
yeah i plan to try to start playing again. still got a few kinks in my install then ill be ready to go.
Well boys, this looks like the place to announce my return as well;)
Have been playing more lately myself again.  Trying to get the mix of mods right

not sure how to add files tt posts now and not sure if mega is considred a place to upload but if its a bad place to use just tell me.

recompiled the dll for 1.2.2

wheni recompiled it it was looking for a dll reference for ksputil but i couldnt find it anywhere to i removed the reference and so far seemss to work fine. before recompike couldnt get ui ingame now ui and ss working.

get the dll here
So, kerbal live feed reunion? Maybe another space race? Man its been almost a decade.  But I suppose everyone's moved on.
